scripts.build: tsc && shx cp src/server/mcp-entry.js build/server/ && shx cp -r src/templates build/templates
scripts.release: git add . && git commit -m 'Pre-release commit' && npm version major && npm run build && git add . && git commit --allow-empty -m 'New major release' && git push && npm publish --access public
scripts.minor: git add . && git commit -m 'Pre-minor commit' && npm version minor && npm run build && git add . && git commit --allow-empty -m 'New minor release' && git push && npm publish --access public
scripts.patch: git add . && git commit -m 'Pre-patch commit' && npm version patch && npm run build && git add . && git commit --allow-empty -m 'New patch release' && git push && npm publish --access public
